sec.title: Acknowledgements
sec.p:
This research was supported by the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation (Project INV-006261): “COVID-19: public health governance & service delivery systems in China”, 2020-2022. It was also supported by the
10.13039/100005156 Alexander von Humboldt Foundation
, through the Alexander von Humboldt Professor award, funded by the
10.13039/501100002347 Federal Ministry of Education and Research
, Germany.

sec.title: Compliance with ethics guidelines
sec.p: Simiao Chen, Qiushi Chen, Weizhong Yang, Lan Xue, Yuanli Liu, Juntao Yang, Chen Wang and Till Bärnighausen declare that they have no conflict of interest or financial conflicts to disclose.
